Gulp SVG Sprites (6 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • fb


    <svg class="icon fb"><use xlink:href="#fb"></use></svg>

  • inst


    <svg class="icon inst"><use xlink:href="#inst"></use></svg>

  • settings


    <svg class="icon settings"><use xlink:href="#settings"></use></svg>

  • share


    <svg class="icon share"><use xlink:href="#share"></use></svg>

  • tm


    <svg class="icon tm"><use xlink:href="#tm"></use></svg>

  • tw


    <svg class="icon tw"><use xlink:href="#tw"></use></svg>
